text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Gamma
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42240, 0xA500. Indicates the value of coefficient gamma.

ROW.title: Photographic Sensitivity
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34855, 0x8827. Indicates the sensitivity of the camera or input device when the image was shot up to the value of 65535 with one of the following parameters that are defined in ISO 12232: standard output sensitivity (SOS), recommended exposure index (REI), or ISO speed.

ROW.title: Sensitivity Type
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34864, 0x8830. Indicates which one of the parameters of ISO12232 is used for PhotographicSensitivity:0 = Unknown 1 = Standard output sensitivity (SOS) 2 = Recommended exposure index (REI) 3 = ISO speed 4 = Standard output sensitivity (SOS) and recommended exposure index (REI) 5 = Standard output sensitivity (SOS) and ISO speed 6 = Recommended exposure index (REI) and ISO speed 7 = Standard output sensitivity (SOS) and recommended exposure index (REI) and ISO speed

ROW.title: Standard Output Sensitivity
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34865, 0x8831. Indicates the standard output sensitivity value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232.

ROW.title: Recommended Exposure Index
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34866, 0x8832. Indicates the recommended exposure index value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232.

ROW.title: ISO Speed
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34867, 0x8833. Indicates the ISO speed value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232.

ROW.title: ISO Speed Latitude yyy
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34868, 0x8834. Indicates the ISO speed latitude yyy value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232.

ROW.title: ISO Speed Latitude zzz
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 34869, 0x8835. Indicates the ISO speed latitude zzz value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232.

ROW.title: Camera Owner Name
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42032, 0xA430. This tag records the owner of a camera used in photography as an ASCII string.

ROW.title: Body Serial Number
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42033, 0xA431. The serial number of the camera or camera body used to take the photograph.

ROW.title: Lens Specification
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42034, 0xA432. notes minimum focal length, maximum focal length, minimum F number in the minimum focal length, and minimum F number in the maximum focal length, which are specification information for the lens that was used in photography.

ROW.title: Lens Make
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42035, 0xA433. Records the lens manufacturer as an ASCII string.

ROW.title: Lens Model
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42036, 0xA434. Records the lens's model name and model number as an ASCII string.

ROW.title: Lens Serial Number
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 42037, 0xA435. This tag records the serial number of the interchangeable lens that was used in photography as an ASCII string.

ROW.title: Interoperability Index
ROW.tagdesc: EXIF tag 1, 0x0001. Indicates the identification of the Interoperability rule. R98 = Indicates a file conforming to R98 file specification of Recommended Exif Interoperability Rules (Exif R 98) or to DCF basic file stipulated by Design Rule for Camera File System (DCF). THM = Indicates a file conforming to DCF thumbnail file stipulated by Design rule for Camera File System. R03 = Indicates a file conforming to DCF Option File stipulated by Design rule for Camera File System.
